Message.Text: Frank, you won’t believe it—our students are actually using Snapchat to share code! Isn’t that incredible?
Tommy, they’re using Discord, not Snapchat. That’s what they’re using to share their code.
No way! I’m pretty sure it’s Snapchat! It’s genius, really—turning a photo-sharing app into a coding hub!
It’s actually Discord, Tommy. That makes way more sense for coding. You can organize everything neatly.
Still, though, can you imagine? Sharing snippets of code through snaps? It’s so out-of-the-box!
I mean, yeah, it would be interesting, but that’s not what’s happening. It’s all happening on Discord.
Well, whatever they’re using, it’s so exciting to see them get creative! They’re really thinking outside the box!
